name: Hacksaw's Stock
description: A heavily modified stock attached to the Hacksaw. It reduces recoil so much it allows for continuous bursts even while standing.

name: Rebel's Suppressor
description: This modified suppressor allows for gas to escape, while reducing sound to a minimal. You don't know but the suppressor might be magic. After all, who could have made this with only a toolbox and good-will?

name: EOTech EXPS3-4 Holographic Hybrid Sight
description: A hybrid sight meant for long range and short range engagements.

name: EOTech EXP-729 SSS
description: The EXP-729 SSS is a short sighted scope meant for small close range engagements.

name: Trijicon Iluminator Sight
description: The Iluminator is close range/barrel to barrel fights meant for SMGs and shotguns.

name: Trijicon 1x24 Sight
description: A medium range reflex sight that allows for quick target changes.

name: Sightmark Mini-Shot Reflex Sight
description: A super small sight that will really only fit on small weapons.

name: Trijicon 1x42 Sight
description: A long range reflex sight that allows for quick target changes.

name: Ultra Duel Shot Pro Night Vision Sight.
description: A short range glowing sight that allows for increased viability at night.

name: Laser Duel Shot Reflex Sight
description: A reflex sight that has a built-in laser sight.

name: ACOG 4x32mm Rifle Scope
description: A long/medium scope used by everything... Well, nearly.

name: VX-3 Rifle Scope
description: A long range scope used by hunting rifles.

name: Spectre DR Duel Role Sights
description: A cool as hell ACOG-like sight used by NATO countries.

name: P-223 Rifle Scope
description: A short range scope used by hunting rifles.

name: V-XR Patrol Rifle Scope
description: A medium range scope used by hunting rifles.

name: .460 Rowland caliber conversion kit
description: A conversion kit for the M1911 pistol to allow it the ability to fire the .460 Rowland pistol caliber. Don't forget the muzzle break!

name: .460 Rowland muzzle brake
description: A muzzle break meant specifically for the M1911 conversion. Found in all .460 Rowland conversion kits at your local Artyoms' Gun Emporium.

name: Artyom's Custom .460 Rowland Conversion Kit
description: A conversion kit for the M1911 to make it shoot .460 Rowland. Dissemble it to get the stuff you need!

name: GP-25
description: A Russian grenade launcher compatible with Warsaw pact weapons. But this one is a recreation of the GP-25 that fits Warsaw AND NATO weapons. And fires the 40mm used by the M203.

name: Grunt's Big Boys
description: This peculiar set-up of two M203 launchers duck-taped to the sides of the Grunt makes it look ridiculous. But in practice, the soldier who made this becomes a one-man mortar team. Slinging massive explosive rounds down range onto unsuspecting zombies and whatnot. A genius of a modification

name: Pedersen Device
description: Replacing several key parts of a .30-06, .308, 7.62x54R, .303, or 7.62x39mm  firearm converting it into a shorter range, semi-automatic carbine. Much more accurate and controllable than the original rifle, it was supposed to be the Wonder Weapon of WWI for the Allies... in 1919. The originals are incredibly rare, however this reproduction includes the kit, chambered in .32 ACP and ready for use in seconds with all major WWI weapons. Score!

name: 8mm Mauser caliber conversion kit
description: This kit is used to convert a shotgun or 7.62x39mm, .303, 7.62x54R, 308, or .30-06 rifle to the famous and powerful .308 caliber.  The conversion results in reduced ammo capacity and a slight reduction to accuracy.
